name: 3D - Space - Labyrinth(Demo)
description:
This  is a abstrackt kind of 3D first-person  euclidian  labyrinth game.

Sometimes you can losst the way and runn in a loop.   

Sometimes exists  more possibillities as you will see in the First runn.

Find the right way to reach the exit portal.

There are  things to think different in this game:   

- Navigation is fun.

- Full camera control can be confusing.

-Gravity changes everything.

-The top can change to the bottom.

HAVE    FUNN TO     SOLVE    THAT     LABYRINTH!

(Buggs:    dont use the mouse in UI   => only use [arrows] and [numpad enter]  on Kaybord)
